evidence_in_dialogue: [[Jack_Willman]] nobody tells me to do anything
[[Catherine]] whoever did this is playing with us
[[Grissom]] someone picks it up motion trips the trap , sets off the timer
[[Brass]] you were let go by thriftright last year , and lost a court battle to get your job back
[[Nick]] she was going back to college , turning her life around getting out of the business , and you killed her for it !
